DOC.brief_summary: The objective project assess impact Game-Based Appointment System , clinical setting , use educational web app www.sjekkdeg.no . An A/B test methodology use . For A/B test test interactivity two version web page www.sjekkdeg.no : A version ( control ) , consist en educative web app ; B version , consist web app www.sjekkdeg.no include Game-Based Appointment System . The Game-Based Appointment System offer user option book appointment venereology department University Hospital North Norway . The system include automatic priority appointment function , three level prioritization ( triage ) : 1 ) Emergency-appointment : The user go doctor day follow day . 2 ) Haste-appointment : Within 3-4 day ; 3 ) Routine-appointment : within 2-3 week . The hypothesis research project : 1 . The number visit health professional large game-based appointment group control group . 2 . DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Online Health Experiment Safer Youth Sexual Behaviour
